description: TeamApt’s core product, Moniepoint, is an agency-banking solution that enables small businesses to provide basic financial services such as deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and bill payments to their customers.
Technisys provides a next-gen digital banking software platform, allowing traditional banks to effectively transform to digital, and enabling challenger, neo banks and fintech companies to jumpstart.

Thunes is making the process of moving money across borders a simple endeavor. The company has built a proprietary interoperable global payments network that enables seamless and real-time movement of funds across borders and payments systems.
Toters is a digital ordering platform and delivery service that connects merchants and consumers.
Trafilea builds direct-to-consumer ecommerce intimates and apparel brands.
Tribal Credit powers startup growth in emerging markets by providing corporate cards and financial solutions.

TruKKer is a tech-enabled truck aggregator that integrates demand & supply for land freight services. The network is built on real-time data analytics using AI/ML, creating reliability, efficiency, and utilization based savings for shippers and transporters.
Tul provides small hardware stores an end-to-end platform that aims to digitize and solve inefficiencies in the supply chain of the construction industry in Latin America.
Twiga Foods is a B2B e-commerce marketplace focusing on food and grocery in the informal retail market. The company sources produce directly from farmers and delivers it to urban retailers.
Tyme is a multi-country digital banking group, focused on bridging the digital divide in emerging markets, by integrating into physical retail ecosystems.

description: Ualá is Argentina’s first one-stop shop digital financial services provider laser-focused on the unbanked and underbanked.
Ula is a horizontal multi-category wholesale e-commerce marketplace that layers technology onto the commercial, financial, and supply-chain elements of traditional retailers in Indonesia
Unico provides clients with the tools they need to easily digitize and manage their documents.
entrepreneurs: ['{"name": "Paulo Roberto de Alencastro Junior", "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/paulo-roberto-de-alencastro-junior-41737122/?originalSubdomain=br"}', '{"name": "Diego Torres Martins", "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/in/diego-torres-martins-a03b55136/?originalSubdomain=br"}']

description: Unifonic is a B2B platform in MENA that makes cloud communications more accessible, cost-efficient and simpler to implement.

Honest Greens offers farm-to-table chef-driven food from local suppliers in a quick, convenient, and affordable format. Consumers have a choice of customizable signature salads and entrees made from sustainably-sourced chef-prepared foods, and can order in-store, or on the Honest Greens app.
Urbvan is a platform-based mass transit mobility network that smartly connects and optimizes urban and intercity mobility for individuals and organizations.
Voicemod offers the best real-time voice changer and soundboard software for streamers and gamers.

VTEX is an end-to-end commerce solution that leverages its microservices-based architecture to help companies sell more, operate efficiently, scale seamlessly and enhance customer experience. The company became a unicorn in 2020 and went public on the NYSE in July 2021.

Wallbox is a global designer, manufacturer, and distributor of smart charging systems that combine innovative technology with outstanding design and manage the communication between vehicle, grid, building and charger.
Waresix is a logistics platform matching unused warehouse space with users in need of such facilities and aims to capitalize on the demand for flexible warehousing in Indonesia.
